meanings.definition: A hormone secreted by the adrenal glands in response to stress or excitement.
meanings.sent1: During the race, his adrenalines surged, giving him energy to run faster.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how adrenalines help us react quickly in dangerous situations.
meanings.sent3: The adrenalines in her body made her feel like she could conquer any challenge.
meanings.sent4: His adrenalines were like little warriors ready to defend him from fear.
meanings.sent5: The rush of adrenalines made the moment unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A synthetic form of the hormone adrenaline used as a medication to treat severe allergic reactions or cardiac arrest.
meanings.sent1: The paramedic administered adrenalines to the patient to save their life.
meanings.sent2: In emergencies, doctors rely on adrenalines to stabilize critical conditions.
meanings.sent3: The nurse joked that the adrenalines were the superheroes of the medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent4: The effect of adrenalines was like a sudden jolt of energy to the heart.
meanings.sent5: The swift action of adrenalines brought relief to the patient.
